summary.overview: This JCL job creates a comprehensive transaction report by extracting transaction data from a VSAM file for a specific date range (January 1, 2022 to July 6, 2022), organizing it by card number, and generating a formatted business report with detailed transaction information including customer details, transaction types, and categories.
business_functions: Backup Transaction Data - Creates a complete backup copy of the transaction data file for data protection and recovery purposes
Filter Transaction Records - Extracts only transactions with processing dates between January 1, 2022 and July 6, 2022 from the backup file
Sort Transactions by Card Number - Organizes filtered transactions in ascending order by card number for efficient customer-based processing

Generate Comprehensive Transaction Report - Creates a formatted business report with detailed transaction analysis including customer identification, transaction descriptions, amounts, dates, and proper categorization using reference data

TRANREPT.jcl.program_overview: Generates comprehensive transaction reports with customer details and transaction categorization

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Master File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Contains transaction records that are read and copied to create backup files for further processing

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Backup File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.BKUP(+1))
datasource_summary.function: Backup file created from transaction VSAM file, contains fixed-length records of 350 characters, used as input for sorting step

datasource_summary.name: Daily Transaction File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.DALY(+1))
datasource_summary.function: Contains sorted and filtered transaction records for specific date ranges, sorted by card number

datasource_summary.name: Card Cross Reference File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.CARDXREF.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Reference file containing card cross-reference information used by the report generation program

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Type Reference File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANTYPE.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Reference file containing transaction type definitions used by the report generation program

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Category Reference File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANCATG.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Reference file containing transaction category information used by the report generation program

datasource_summary.name: Date Parameter File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.DATEPARM)
datasource_summary.function: Input parameter file containing date parameters used by the report generation program

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Report File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANREPT(+1))
datasource_summary.function: Output report file containing formatted transaction report with 133-character fixed-length records generated by the CBTRN03C program

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    CBTRN03C["Generates comprehensive transaction reports with customer details and transaction categorization (CBTRN03C) "]
